title: Michigan Jury Convicts Men of Supporting Plot to Kidnap Governor
description: The trial in state court followed mixed results in federal court for others accused of scheming to kidnap Gov. Gretchen Whitmer.
dc:creator: Mitch Smith
media:description: The defendants were accused of helping Adam Fox, who was convicted in federal court of conspiring to kidnap the governor, whose Covid-19 restrictions the men considered tyrannical.
